message: and i don't mean currently logged in user
basically i want to know if user username "abc" is on site
5 minutes or some would be enough
@dmishe How do you define "on site"? Active within, say, the last five minutes? Or *now*? I would probably go with web sockets in the latter case.
You could use a database or fast store (like Redis) to log activity of a logged-in user for each request, keeping the row active for the length of time that you want to track (5 minutes, or whatever)
